skills.name: Palace of Misery
skills.description: [SP: 20][CD: 18s] Deploys the weapon. For a period of 10s, attacks of allies gain 30.0% Physical DMG against stunned enemies. Fires light beams every 1.5s at a random enemy within range to deal 320.0% ATK of Physical DMG and knockdown. The 1st hit will stun enemies for 5s and inflict 10 Stun Trauma.

skills.name: Mist of Decay
skills.description: Character attacks on stunned enemies gain 50.0% Total DMG Multiplier.
